name: Bealphareth
overview: Bealphareth is classified as a "new-thinking" action RPG. It was released in 2000. The dialogue spoken and scenarios revealed will differ depending on your actions! A legendary underground city of long ago, known as "Asla Faere", has reappeared, and a group of young adventurers has set out to shed light on its mysteries. But soon the entire world is at stake, thus leading to a prologue in this story of destruction and creation. The world cannot be saved by sword alone.
